Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
count("FA Depreciation Book" where(
                "FA Book Type" = filter("Income Tax"),
                "FA Block Code" = field("Code"),
                "Disposal Date" = filter('')))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA Block Code" = field("Code"),
                "FA Book Type" = filter("Income Tax"),
                "FA Posting Category" = filter(' '),
                "FA Posting Type" = filter(
                    "Acquisition Cost" |
                    Depreciation |
                    "Proceeds on Disposal" |
                    "Write-Down" |
                    Appreciation |
                    "Salvage Value")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
count("FA Depreciation Book" where(
                "FA Book Type" = filter("Income Tax"),
                "FA Block Code" = field("Code"),
                "Disposal Date" = field("Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: ObsoleteReason
Properties.Value: New field introduced as Fixed Asset Posting Group

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Acquisition Cost"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const(Depreciation),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "Part of Book Value" = const(true),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Proceeds on Disposal"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Gain/Loss"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Write-Down"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const(Appreciation),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Custom 1"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Custom 2"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "Part of Depreciable Basis" = const(true),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(" "),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Salvage Value"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("FA Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "FA Posting Category" = const(Disposal),
                "FA Posting Type" = const("Book Value on Disposal"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value:
sum("Maintenance Ledger Entry".Amount where(
                "FA No." = field("FA No."),
                "Depreciation Book Code" = field("Depreciation Book Code"),
                "Maintenance Code" = field("Maintenance Code Filter"),
                "FA Posting Date" = field("FA Posting Date Filter")))

Properties.Name: Permissions
Properties.Value:
TableData "FA Ledger Entry" = r,
                  TableData "Maintenance Ledger Entry" = r

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date that the accounting period will begin.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether to use the accounting period to start a fiscal year.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the accounting period belongs to a closed fiscal year.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you can change the starting date the accounting period.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Open a new fiscal year and define its accounting periods so you can start posting documents.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Close the current fiscal year. A confirmation message will display that tells you which year will be closed. You cannot reopen the year after it has been closed.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Fixed Asset Accounting Periods Inc. Tax

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the FA Class Code for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the description for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the total book value for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the applicable depreciation % for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the additional depreciation % for FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of assets in FA Block.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed asset posting group.

Properties.Name: ObsoleteReason
Properties.Value: New field introduced as Fixed Asset Posting Group

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed asset posting group.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of depreciation years.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the straight line % where depreciation method is straight line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the declining balance % where depreciation method is declining balance.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the first user-defined depreciation date.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed asset exchange rate with FA additional currency.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if fixed asset ledger check is used.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the rate of depreciation after book value of asset is zero.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed depreciation amount after asset's book value is zero.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the projected proceeds on disposal.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the depreciation starting date where depreciation method is custom 1.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the depreciation ending date where depreciation method is custom 1.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the accumulated depreciation % where depreciation method is custom 1.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the depreciation this year % where depreciation method is custom 1.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if use half-year convention is used for depreciation calculation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the property class where depreciation method is custom 1.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the depreciation need to be calculated for DB% in the first year, where retrospective effect of depreciation needs to be calculated.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the temp. fixed depreciation amount.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the used number of days.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the fixed asset has been dosposed off.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the book value of the asset.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code for the depreciation book to be included in the report or batch job.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed asset posting date to be used by the batch job. The batch job includes ledger entries up to this date. This date appears in the FA Posting Date field in the resulting journal lines. if the Use Same FA+G/L Posting Dates field has been activated in the depreciation book that is used in the batch job, then this date must be the same as the posting date entered in the Posting Date field.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the program to use the number of days, as specified in the field below, in the depreciation calculation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the program to use the number of days, as specified in the field below, in the depreciation calculation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the posting date to be used by the batch job.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies, if you leave the field empty, the next available number on the resulting journal line. if a number series is not set up, enter the document number that you want assigned to the resulting journal line.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the posting date to be used by the batch job as a filter.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the batch job to automatically insert fixed asset entries with balancing accounts.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date from which the report or batch job processes information.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how many accounting periods to include.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the period for which data is shown in the report. For example, enter "1M" for one month, "30D" for thirty days, "3Q" for three quarters, or "5Y" for five years.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the maximum number of days in seasonal industry.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the maximum number of days in non-seasonal industry.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the FA Book Type is Income tax.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the threshold days for depreciation calculation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the depreciation reduction % for the depreciation book.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the first depreciation date where depreciation method is manual.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the salvage value of the asset for the depreciation book.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if additional depreciation is applicable for the asset for Income Tax Depreciation Book.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the FA Block Code for Income tax Depreciation Book.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the general product posting group for the fixed asset.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Calculates depreciation according to conditions that you specify. if the related depreciation book is set up to integrate with the general ledger, then the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset general ledger journal. Otherwise, the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset journal. You can then review the entries and post the journal.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Calculates depreciation according to conditions that you specify. if the related depreciation book is set up to integrate with the general ledger, then the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset general ledger journal. Otherwise, the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset journal. You can then review the entries and post the journal.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Calculate depreciation according to conditions that you specify. If the related depreciation book is set up to integrate with the general ledger, then the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset general ledger journal. Otherwise, the calculated entries are transferred to the fixed asset journal. You can then review the entries and post the journal.

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value: "Fixed Asset Block".Code where("FA Class Code" = field("FA Class Code"))

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the blocks assigned to Fixed Asset Class.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the line number of FA shift being used in journal entry.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the line number of FA shift being used in journal entry.

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value: "Fixed Asset Block".Code where("FA Class Code" = field("FA Class Code"))
